Inscribed in Quadrilateral (E, Q)

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Draw > Ellipse > Inscribed in Quadrilateral (E, Q)
Commands: ellipseinscribedquad | eq

Description:

Draws an ellipse that is inscribed in a quadrilateral.

Procedure:

  1. Specify the first line of the quadrilateral.
  2. Specify the second line of the quadrilateral.
  3. Specify the third line of the quadrilateral.
  4. Specify the fourth line of the quadrilateral.
